member.name: T:ModdingAPI.FileUtil
member.summary: A class for handling file IO related operations

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.loadConfig``1
member.summary: Loads the configuration file for this mod from the configs folder
member.typeparam: The type of the config object

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.saveConfig``1(``0)
member.summary: Saves a configuration file for this mod to the configs folder
member.typeparam: The type of the config object

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.appendLog(System.String)
member.summary: Adds a message to the log file for this mod
member.param: The message to add to the log file

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.clearLog
member.summary: Clears the log file for this mod

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.loadDataText(System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Loads a string from a file in the data folder
member.param: The name of the data file
The data string, or null if the file deosn't exist
member.returns: Whether the data was loaded successfully or not

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.loadDataArray(System.String,System.String[]@)
member.summary: Loads an array from a file in the data folder
member.param: The name of the data file
The data array, or null if the file deosn't exist
member.returns: Whether the data was loaded successfully or not

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.loadDataDictionary(System.String,System.Collections.Generic.Dictionary{System.String,System.String}@)
member.summary: Loads a dictionary from a file in the data folder
member.param: The name of the data file
The data dictionary, or null if the file deosn't exist
member.returns: Whether the data was loaded successfully or not

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.loadDataImages(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Int32,System.Boolean,UnityEngine.Sprite[]@)
member.summary: Loads an array of images from an image file in the data folder
member.param: The name of the data file
The pixel size of each square sprite in the image
The pixels per unit of each square sprite in the image
The border size of each square sprite in the image
Whether a point filter should be applied to the image
The data images, or null if the file deosn't exist
member.returns: Whether the data was loaded successfully or not

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.saveTextFile(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes text to a file in the root directory
member.param: The name of text file to create
The text to write to the file

member.name: M:ModdingAPI.FileUtil.jsonObject``1(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a json string into a json object
member.typeparam: The type of object to convert to
member.param: The json string to convert into an object
member.returns: The object created from the json string

member.summary: Converts an object into a json string

member.param: The object to convert into a json string
